Description: Wooden anthropoid coffin of Bakenmut; painted detail on plaster; Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.638 Singleton in Strudwick & Taylor (eds), The Theban Necropolis (2003): 83-7, pls.28-38.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
